statements: UPDATE student_attendance SET participation = true WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE student_attendance SET course_id = '78901234-5678-90ab-cdef-123456789abc' WHERE student_id = '56789012-3456-7890-12ab-cdef12345678';
UPDATE student_attendance SET participation = true WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE student_attendance SET course_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', attendance_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE student_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE students SET student_name = 'John Doe' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE attendance SET is_present = true, attendance_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET student_name='Alice', email='alice@example.com' WHERE student_id=1;
UPDATE attendance SET is_present=true WHERE student_id=2 AND attendance_date='2022-10-15';
UPDATE students SET name='Alice', email='alice@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE attendance SET is_present=1 WHERE student_id=2 AND course_id=1;
UPDATE students SET email='newEmail@example.com', name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE courses SET course_description='Updated course description' WHERE course_id=2;
UPDATE student SET student_name = 'Alice' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE participation SET participation_grade = 95.5 WHERE student_id = 2 AND course_id = 101;

UPDATE participation SET participation_grade = 95.5, participation_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
